fullplot: Queen is a movie about growing up. Rani (Kangana Ranaut) is a Delhi girl from a conservative family who is ditched by her fiancè just before her wedding. Shocked by this, she decides to set out on the planned honeymoon alone. As she travels the world and meets new people, she gains new experiences and discovers her own identity.
plot: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.
title: Queen
